amendment.description: Amendment ensures that underrepresented individuals, such as women and minorities, are included in the Supporting Young Emerging Scientists Report.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-193 to ensure underrepresented individuals, such as women and minorities, are included in the Supporting Young Emerging Scientists Report.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
